sentence.Network_en: What a talker that woman is!

entry.tran: 健谈的人;以某种方式说话的人
entry.def: You can use talker to refer to someone when you are considering how much they talk, or how good they are at talking to people.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who expresses in language; someone who talks (especially someone who delivers a public speech or someone especially garrulous);
